text: <@U89DUQGKD> exactly! Support contacted me yesterday in the evening and the problem was with icons. My modules had only the defaults. I already fixed that, thanks!
Thanks William. I was able to correct the issue. It had something to do with the relative/absolute paths to a module.
are there best practice examples about when to use tooltip-helptext and when inline-helptext? Should both be used or should one be chosen?
I often put things like "Optional", "This must be X", "Recommended image dimensions: XxY" or important one-liners in the inline text and then any how-tos or longer explanations as a tooltip.
thanks that is a great tip!!

Hey there, when i open up the theme settings the different font-weights are not loaded. If i change the template with “view on:” and go back to that same template it works. Did somebody run into this as well?
